27#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
28
29#include <sys/nvpair.h>
30
31static void *
32nv_alloc_sys(nv_alloc_t *nva, size_t size)
33{
34 return (kmem_alloc(size, (int)(uintptr_t)nva->nva_arg));
35}
36
37/*ARGSUSED*/
38static void
39nv_free_sys(nv_alloc_t *nva, void *buf, size_t size)
40{
41 kmem_free(buf, size);
42}
43
44static const nv_alloc_ops_t system_ops = {
45 NULL, /* nv_ao_init() */
46 NULL, /* nv_ao_fini() */
47 nv_alloc_sys, /* nv_ao_alloc() */
48 nv_free_sys, /* nv_ao_free() */
49 NULL /* nv_ao_reset() */
50};
51
52nv_alloc_t nv_alloc_sleep_def = {
53 &system_ops,
54 (void *)KM_SLEEP
55};
56
57nv_alloc_t nv_alloc_nosleep_def = {
58 &system_ops,
59 (void *)KM_NOSLEEP
60};
61
62nv_alloc_t *nv_alloc_sleep = &nv_alloc_sleep_def;
63nv_alloc_t *nv_alloc_nosleep = &nv_alloc_nosleep_def;
64
